Assorted Campaign Creative

Overview

This is a small collection of banners, emails and more that I designed for various campaigns. Each piece was made to follow the flow of the campaign and it's look & feel, while adhering to brand guidelines.

Ask me for more details on each piece if you'd like to know more!
